titles.title: A resolution amending the Standing Rules of the Senate.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1201-1202)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 338, 88th Congress, to change the membership of the Select Committee on Ethics from Members of the Senate to three private citizens. Requires two of such citizens to be former Members of the Congress (preferably Senators) and one to be a retired Federal judge.
